title: Software Engineer, Azure
description: Develop and maintain services and features for Microsoft Azure cloud platform.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in C#, Java, or Python
responsibilities: Design, code, and test scalable cloud services
Collaborate with product and design teams
Participate in code reviews and technical discussions

title: Program Manager, Microsoft 365
description: Drive the planning and execution of features for Microsoft 365 applications.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
5+ years of experience in program management
Experience with SaaS products and agile methodologies
responsibilities: Work closely with engineering and design teams

title: Data Scientist, Bing
description: Utilize data to improve search relevance and user experience for Bing.
requirements: Master's or PhD in a quantitative field
3+ years of experience in data science or analytics
Proficiency in Python, R, or Scala
responsibilities: Develop and implement machine learning models
Provide data-driven recommendations to product teams

title: Cloud Solution Architect, Azure
description: Partner with customers to design and implement cloud solutions on Microsoft Azure.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
7+ years of experience in customer-facing technical roles
Deep understanding of Azure services and architecture

title: Software Engineer, Xbox
description: Contribute to the development of the Xbox platform and gaming experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in C++ development
Experience with game development or high-performance computing
responsibilities: Develop and optimize game features and systems
Work on performance and scalability challenges
Collaborate with game studios and internal teams
